com.nokia.lwuit
Class GestureHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.nokia.lwuit.GestureHandler

public abstract class GestureHandler
extends java.lang.Object

A abstract class to handle Gestures. Extend from this class and implement the gestureAction-method. Using one of the two static methods, you can activate the handler to listen all gestures or listen only when spesific form is visible.

Method Detail

getGestures

public int getGestures()

setGlobalGestureHandler

public static void setGlobalGestureHandler(GestureHandler h)
Set global gesturehandler that will receive all the gestures. Setting it null will remove current global gesturehandler.

Parameters:
h - Class that implements the GestureHandler interface

setFormGestureHandler

public static void setFormGestureHandler(Form f,
                                         GestureHandler h)
Set gesturehandler for a spesific form. The handler will receive gesture- events when the form is visible.

Parameters:
f -
h -

gestureAction

public abstract void gestureAction(com.nokia.mid.ui.gestures.GestureEvent e)
Override to handle gestureEvents.

Parameters:
e - GestureEvent that will contain information about the current gesture.
